name: RegExCheck
description: A VSTS build task for checking file contents against a regular expression.
author: James Taylor

inputs.name: checkString
inputs.label: Regular Expression
inputs.helpMarkDown: A regular expression to check files against.

inputs.name: rootDirectory
inputs.label: Root Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the directory to start the check in, the check is recursive.

inputs.name: fileName
inputs.label: File Path RegEx
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression to filter files on their full path, only matching items will be searched. If left blank all files in the search directory are included.

inputs.name: expectedMatches
inputs.label: Number of expected matches
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the number of matches does not equal this value the task will fail.
